member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Background.CommunicationBlockingAppSetAsActiveTrigger
member.summary: Represents a trigger to activate a communication blocking application when it is selected as the preferred blocking app.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Background.CommunicationBlockingAppSetAsActiveTrigger.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the CommunicationBlockingAppSetAsActiveTrigger.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.CommunicationBlocking.CommunicationBlockingAccessManager
member.summary: The manager responsible for keeping track of blocked numbers and displaying the appropriate blocking user interfaces.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.CommunicationBlocking.CommunicationBlockingAccessManager.IsBlockingActive
member.summary: Gets whether or not blocking is currently enabled.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.CommunicationBlocking.CommunicationBlockingAccessManager.IsBlockedNumberAsync(System.String)
member.summary: An asynchronous operation that returns whether or not a number is on the block list.
member.returns: Asynchronously returns whether or not the number is blocked.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.CommunicationBlocking.CommunicationBlockingAccessManager.ShowBlockedCallsUI
member.summary: Displays the list of blocked calls.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.CommunicationBlocking.CommunicationBlockingAccessManager.ShowBlockedMessagesUI
member.summary: Displays the list of blocked messages.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.CommunicationBlocking.CommunicationBlockingAccessManager.ShowBlockNumbersUI(Windows.Foundation.Collections.IIterable{System.String})
member.summary: Launches a UI to block numbers if there as an active blocking app.
member.param: The list of numbers to add to the block list.
member.returns: Returns **true** if the active blocking app is launched, otherwise returns **false**.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.CommunicationBlocking.CommunicationBlockingAccessManager.ShowUnblockNumbersUI(Windows.Foundation.Collections.IIterable{System.String})
member.summary: Launches the app to unblock numbers if there as an active blocking app.
member.param: The list of numbers to remove from the block list.
member.returns: Returns **true** if the active blocking app is launched, otherwise returns **false**.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.CommunicationBlocking.CommunicationBlockingAppManager
member.summary: Determines the application to use as a blocking application.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.CommunicationBlocking.CommunicationBlockingAppManager.IsCurrentAppActiveBlockingApp
member.summary: Indicates whether the current application is the active blocking application.
member.returns: Value that tells whether the current application is the active blocking app.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.CommunicationBlocking.CommunicationBlockingAppManager.RequestSetAsActiveBlockingAppAsync
member.summary: Calls a dialog to set the current app as the default phone communication blocking application.
member.returns: Indicates whether the app was set as the default phone origin application.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.CommunicationBlocking.CommunicationBlockingAppManager.ShowCommunicationBlockingSettingsUI
member.summary: Displays the UI to select the currently active blocking application.
